content: Do you mean that you have two email accounts belonging to the same email address and you want to delete one of them? If that is the case, then the following steps might be helpful: "Settings" > "Accounts" section > tap the account you want to delete > tap three vertical dots on the top right corner > "Remove account".
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content:
Thunderbird for Android does not have address book on its own.

You can post feature request in the following forum: https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/idb-p/ideas/label-name/thunderbird%20android

There is the same feature request in the above forum already, and you can upvote them: an address book in Thunderbird for android https://connect.mozilla.org/t5/ideas/an-address-book-in-thunderbird-for-android/idi-p/84952
creator: Yu5tiqX9og

content: This is the very definition of imap, actions you take on one device are reflected in all other locations.
creator: wsmwk
